title: What are the two fonts used in this picture?
author: docolmo

comments.content:
Bride of the Sea: [Dancing](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071840/http:/www.impallari.com/dancing) by Pablo Impallari  
VENICE: could be [Patua Ltt](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071840/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/patua-one)
